game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and recover the ancient artifact.
game.description: In a forgotten temple deep in the jungle, an artifact of great power has been lost. Your mission is to navigate through treacherous ruins, solve puzzles, and retrieve it.
game.reward: 500 experience points and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple
task.description: You've been given an old map that marks the general area of the temple. Use it to find the hidden entrance.

task.objective: Decode the hieroglyphs on the door
task.description: The temple's main door is covered in mysterious hieroglyphs. Decipher them to unlock the entrance.
